Variable Documentation

A library for simulating operations on sets of qubits Example operations run a simple qubit example on one edit the COMMON CONFIG section at the beginning of makefile in the root directory Change COMPILER
Initial value:
GNU to COMPILER=INTEL. Then run:

```
make clean
make
./demo 8
```

This will report some information about the size of the system

A library for simulating operations on sets of qubits Example operations run a simple qubit example on one edit the COMMON CONFIG section at the beginning of makefile in the root directory Change perform rotations and verify that the state vector of probability amplitudes is still normalized OpenMP is enabled by default To change the number of threads used by the set the value of OMP_NUM_THREADS before running the eg export copy from the examples folder into the root eg

Definition at line 48 of file README.md.

A library for simulating operations on sets of qubits Example operations run a simple qubit example on one edit the COMMON CONFIG section at the beginning of makefile in the root directory Change perform rotations and verify that the state vector of probability amplitudes is still normalized OpenMP is enabled by default To change the number of threads used by the set the value of OMP_NUM_THREADS before running the eg export copy from the examples folder into the root eg use the job submission script examples ompJob sh A basic example file is available in examples basicTemplate c The structure of this file leave the initialization and cleanup sections and edit the measurement and phase gate sections Further explanations are in the template file The full list of QuEST library functions that can be used here is listed in qubits h To run over several nodes with MPI

Definition at line 48 of file README.md.

A library for simulating operations on sets of qubits Example operations run a simple qubit example on one edit the COMMON CONFIG section at the beginning of makefile in the root directory Change perform rotations and verify that the state vector of probability amplitudes is still normalized OpenMP is enabled by default To change the number of threads used by the set the value of OMP_NUM_THREADS before running the eg export copy from the examples folder into the root eg MY_FILE_NAME
Initial value:
timingDemo 

Change the name of the executable as desired eg EXE=myProg.

Run with:
```
make clean
make
./myProg [NUMBER OF QUBITS] 
```
To run on arcus-b on one node

Definition at line 20 of file README.md.

A library for simulating operations on sets of qubits Example operations run a simple qubit example on one edit the COMMON CONFIG section at the beginning of makefile in the root directory Change perform rotations and verify that the state vector of probability amplitudes is still normalized OpenMP is enabled by default To change the number of threads used by the set the value of OMP_NUM_THREADS before running the eg export OMP_NUM_THREADS
Initial value:
16. See examples/ompJob.sh for an example of how to do this in a job submission script.



There are other examples of codes using the QuEST library in the examples folder. To use one of these

Definition at line 28 of file README.md.

A library for simulating operations on sets of qubits Example operations run a simple qubit example on one edit the COMMON CONFIG section at the beginning of makefile in the root directory Change perform rotations and verify that the state vector of probability amplitudes is still normalized OpenMP is enabled by default To change the number of threads used by the set the value of OMP_NUM_THREADS before running the eg export copy from the examples folder into the root eg use the job submission script examples ompJob sh A basic example file is available in examples basicTemplate c The structure of this file leave the initialization and cleanup sections and edit the rotations

Definition at line 48 of file README.md.

A library for simulating operations on sets of qubits Example operations run a simple qubit example on one edit the COMMON CONFIG section at the beginning of makefile in the root directory Change perform rotations and verify that the state vector of probability amplitudes is still normalized OpenMP is enabled by default To change the number of threads used by the set the value of OMP_NUM_THREADS before running the eg export copy from the examples folder into the root eg use the job submission script examples ompJob sh A basic example file is available in examples basicTemplate c The structure of this file leave the initialization and cleanup sections and edit the measurement and phase gate sections Further explanations are in the template file The full list of QuEST library functions that can be used here is listed in qubits h To run over several nodes with edit the COMMON CONFIG section at the beginning of makefile Change USE_MPI
Initial value:
0 to USE_MPI=1.

Run with:
```
make clean
make
mpirun -np [NUMBER OF PROCESSES] ./demo [NUMBER OF QUBITS]
```
To run on arcus-b
